FOUND IN: Okapi (a close relative of the giraffe, though not quite "giraffe-like")

CLUE: King Richard 1st had nickname like Latin hero
FOUND IN: Lionhearted (combining the king's name with the lion symbolizing bravery and Roman virtues)
Panic-stricken (related to reactions to acts of terror)
Banana (when slightly yellow, but not fully ripe)
